Description: The Society's involvement in Peely's sudden disappearance has put them at the top of Jones' list. He knows they took his friend. The rescue mission is on!
ShortDescription: Iconic renegade on a mission for retribution.

Dialogues.Message: Where are you, buddy? Oh...hi...
It's time for our final face-off with The Society.
I don't know anything about this relic you're looking for. You should've left Peely out of this.
You thought it was funny to pick on a poor, defenseless banana?
Hope thinks you're better than The Society. I think you're all the same.
Everything you've built is gonna shatter.
We make a good team. I'm glad I didn't have to do this alone.
The Society is going to pay.
Sometimes you gotta throw your support behind the right side.
Greetings from The Underground, friend.
Trust me. There's a reason they don't call me Friendship Jones.
It's all been building up to this. Time to confront The Society.
Hope was right. This whole Island needs help.
With my best bud rescued, I'll be ready for anything...
They took Peely because of my history. They thought they could use me.

Description: The idealistic founder of The Underground, Hope is on a mission to help Jones save his friend, as long as he's willing to support her fight against The Society... and her own sister, Valeria.
ShortDescription: Make some trouble. Change the world.

Dialogues.Message: Time to dismantle a villainous power structure!
We... might actually stand a chance of taking down The Society.
What is this mysterious project of yours? I'm worried about you, Valy.
You weren't always part of The Society. I'm still holding out hope.
You're going to have to use that sword if you want to stop me.
Every thief gets caught one day. Even you.
I'll always have your back. And I'm glad to know you have mine.
Most of The Society would do anything for more power.
I hope Valeria will forgive me... and maybe even see that I'm right.
What is Valeria searching for? I need to know.
The Society is on the back foot. It's time to strike.
Time to dismantle a villainous power structure!
Valeria doesn't seem worried. She seems... excited. Why?

Description: Scout Specialist. There are few things Snow Striker can't see. Like polka dots.

Dialogues.Message: Lose something?
Stay in the shadows.

Description: Heavy Specialist. Metal Mouth is a simple man. He sees a target, he shoots.
ShortDescription: What lies beyond that sinister smile?

Dialogues.Message: No one ever talks about the downside to having a metal mouth. The rust.
What, something in my teeth?

Description: Supply Specialist. Steelsight will reward you with some valuable ammo. If you've got the bars.

Dialogues.Message: This Island's in chaos. But chaos means more work for someone like me.
If you're good at something, never do it for free.
Hope's not here. Leave me out of your family drama, thanks.
You're never gonna take down The Society if you won't even take down your sister.
This Island's in chaos. But chaos means more work for someone like me.
The Society? The Underground? More like a family feud.
My friend Hope lets me stay here between gigs. It's a good spot for laying low.
This place belongs to Hope, the leader of the Underground.
Don't tell The Society about this place. It's Hope's secret getaway.
The Society are getting nervous. Hope and Jones are making progress.

Description: Heavy Specialist. Mecha Team Shadow is immune to fire and is equipped with explosives.

Dialogues.Message: I am available to hire, if you need something blown up.
I love stealth. I love explosions. I contain multitudes.

Description: Scout Specialist. Retirement was nice for Contract Giller. All you can eat fish food, a nice big tank, a treasure chest filled with bubbles. Then the Society showed up and 'dirtied the water'. It's time to clean the tank.

Dialogues.Message: Sounds like it's time to clean the tank.
The fish bowl was nice, but The Society needs to be stopped.

Description: Medical Specialist. Dara lives by three rules: be prepared for everything, trust no one, and... well, she doesn't know what the third rule is yet, but she's prepared to figure it out.

Dialogues.Message: You're back? But, no one ever comes back...
Look out for yourself out there. No one else will.
So, you found another crew. Wonder when you'll leave THEM behind.
I told you, Jones. I'll help you this once, but I work alone.
You used to be a nomad. Why'd you give it up?
You're back? But, no one ever comes back...
The Society is falling apart. I guess change really is possible.

Description: Crafty, clever, and careful, Starr Oakley's made a name for herself doing what she does best: putting on a show with her incredible archery trickshots.

Dialogues.Message: Here to challenge me again? What, you didn't learn your lesson?
You can bet against me if you want. Just know you'll lose.
I'll give you this: it's brave to meet me face-to-face.
Your reputation doesn't scare me. My arrows are faster than your fists.
Fencing? Real fighting doesn't stop when you score a point.
Don't be naive, Hope. Valeria won't stop for anyone, even you.
Here to challenge me again? What, you didn't learn your lesson?
Let The Society keep fighting amongst themselves. That's how we'll win.
The Society's losing control. Let's hope they don't make any desperate moves.
Valeria would betray anyone to find those answers she's looking for.

Description: Scout Specialist. The man who makes the impossible possible, Solid Snake has plenty of experience saving the world from crisis time and time again.
ShortDescription: A master of stealth, unrivaled in covert ops.

Dialogues.Message: I'm no hero. Never was, never will be
Kept you waiting, huh?
There's no winning or losing for a mercenary.
Find something to believe in.

Description: The mysterious heir to the Hesk fortune is perhaps the last elite still defying The Society's reign. Silas Hesk is willing to quietly assist The Underground's efforts. Just don't ask about the snake.
ShortDescription: Cold-blooded heir to a venomous dynasty.

Dialogues.Message: I'm not one of you Underground foolsssss, but I can help you out now and again.
So you're the one ssssstanding against The Society. Unwise, but brave.
You're playing a dangerousssss game, Hope. You'd better be successful.
I have no interest in joining your Society, so sssssstop asking me.
I know you're hunting for ancient ssssecrets. But what might they be...?
I'm not one of you Underground foolsssss, but I can help you out now and again.
The Sssssociety is arrogant. The only arrogance I find charming is mine.
Don't ask about my ssssnake friend. He is just a pet, and definitely not possessssssing this body.
I knew it was ssssmart to bet against The Society.
Whatever Valeria wassss looking for... I think she found it.

Description: Leelah has come for one thing and one thing only. FRIENDS! She knows the Island isn't necessarily the best place to find them, but she has high hopes!

Dialogues.Message: Heyya best friend, what can I do for you?
Oooh, a new friend. HI!
Heyya best friend, what can I do for you?
Has anyone tried BEFRIENDING The Society yet?
Have you seen the Underground's hideout? So. Cool.
You know, extra arms REALLY come in handy. Just saying.
Hey! What's better, red and green, or green and red?

Description: Ready and reporting for duty! Boxy heard about the beef between The Society and The Underground, and she's here to help unpack the problem.

Dialogues.Message: Aw, you didn't get me anything?
I got you a present! ME!
You need to think inside the box.
Wow, that storm really boxes you in, huh?
You need to think inside the box.
Time to send them packing.
What a six-sided standoff.

Description: Nothing fazes April, not even four mutated Turtles who know ninjutsu. Okay, maybe that fazed her a little. But now, she's here to help the Turtles take down the Foot Clan.
ShortDescription: Channel 6 News' investigative reporter in the field.

Dialogues.Message: Let's show the Foot Clan who they're messing with.
I really thought I had seen everything.
I won't let you give up!
Time to do what you do best, Raph. Brawn over brains.
Thanks for always being there for me, Donnie.
Oh, Mikey. Don't you ever think about anything besides pizza?
Don't worry, Master Splinter. I'll take care of them.

Description: A ninjutsu master even before the Mutagen changed him, Master Splinter raised the Turtles as his sons, and taught them the way of the ninja to protect themselves from the outside world.
ShortDescription: Stoic sage, adoptive father and ninjutsu master who adores his sons.

Dialogues.Message: Remember why you fight.
The path ahead is blocked only by the first step.
I made you leader for one simple reason. You asked.
Remember, my son, anger is self-destructive.
We must fall many times before we learn to stand.
A creative mind must be balanced by discipline.
You only fail if you give up.

Description: Nowhere is safer than the obscuring snow. Nothing is colder than the devouring blizzard. No one is more steadfast than the enduring Snowheart. When the storm clears, she remains.
ShortDescription: Hard as stone. Cold as ice.

Dialogues.Message: When the storm comes, find safety.
Nothing shall deter me.
When the storm comes, find safety.
Ice can burn, if you are not careful.
The road I travel is my own.

Description: Who is the enigmatic Odyssey, and why has she come to the Island just as The Society's fates have started to falter? She seeks answers about a mysterious mosaic, connected to ancient power...

Dialogues.Message: Someone on this Island has been chasing powers they don't understand.
I can feel an ancient power growing on this Island...
Hope! The whispers were true...
You have wandered from your true path... but destiny is not yet done with you.
Even diamond will shatter when its weaknesses are exploited.
I will not give you the answers you seek. Walk the path you have sought, and bear its consequences.
Someone on this Island has been chasing powers they don't understand.
The Mosaic is the key to what is coming. It bears a warning.
Mundane powers like The Society always believe their influence is eternal, even just before they fall.
I am Odyssey. I am merely a traveler, following the path of ancient insight.
No destiny is certain... but yours hums with potential.
These "Medallions" are shards of mysterious power, dug out from long-gone history.

Description: Oh hey! You're probably wondering how I got here, huh? Well, it all started when...oh, you're just here for some items? Okay, well, I've still got you covered!

Dialogues.Message: Who's your favorite person on the island? It's okay, I'll wait.
Have you seen any vending machines around? Just curious.
I LOVE your style.
Who's your favorite person on the island? It's okay, I'll wait.
What's MY favorite weapon? Can't I just say all of them?
What's a Llama got to do to get a weapon around here?
Can I call you bestie, or is that like, so cringe?
How's the battle going? Need a pep talk?
Who's your favorite person on the island? It's okay, I'll wait.
Have you seen any vending machines around? Just curious.
I LOVE your style.
Who's your favorite person on the island? It's okay, I'll wait.
What's MY favorite weapon? Can't I just say all of them?
What's a Llama got to do to get a weapon around here?
Can I call you bestie, or is that like, so cringe?
How's the battle going? Need a pep talk?

Description: From musical beats to seismic feats, Sonor has spent his life listening to the Island around him. Feeling the steady rhythms of an unsteady world. And that tempo? It's changing again.
ShortDescription: Feel the echo. Create the beat.

Dialogues.Message: The Island's got its own rhythm. Just gotta know how to listen.
Hey, you feel that beat? Listen.
The Island's got its own rhythm. Just gotta know how to listen.
Everything's got a beat. This Island, me, even you.
Stayin' safe out there? The beat's goin' wild today.
The Society may be falling, but somethin' else will pick up the beat. Trust me.

Description: Medical Specialist. Hire Sun Tan Specialist if you need help staying alive. Especially out on the waves.

Dialogues.Message: Lookin' to charge some heavy bombs, bro?
I thought I caught my last wave, bro. But if you need my help...
I know, I know, I should put down the board. But have you seen the bombs out there, bro?
I was told you know some radical tricks. Ever snap off-the-lip?
Woah, bro. Something tells me you don't like water.
